position: Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur | Incoming intern at @Mathworks | Mechanical Engineering | Fourth-year undergraduate

experience.title: CORE TEAM MEMBER
experience.description: • Worked under the President - Technology Students’ Gymkhana on 3 fronts- Sponsorship, Accommodation and Event Management.• Organized 548 sporting events, 9 cultural nights & 8 Guest lectures which saw a participation of 3000+ students & coaches from all the 23 IITs.• Led a team of 12 Crew Team Members for the planning and execution of the 9-day long sporting extravaganza on different verticals like ensuring presence of teams and referees on time, managing inventory, updating the results & crowd control.• Introduced Live Streaming, Live Score Update (App and Website), adventure and recreational Activities from the Sponsorship raised.• Conceptualised the Sports Meet arena, improving utilization of covered area, theme implementation.
experience.description_html: • Worked under the President - Technology Students’ Gymkhana on 3 fronts- Sponsorship, Accommodation and Event Management.• Organized 548 sporting events, 9 cultural nights & 8 Guest lectures which saw a participation of 3000+ students & coaches from all the 23 IITs.• Led a team of 12 Crew Team Members for the planning and execution of the 9-day long sporting extravaganza on different verticals like ensuring presence of teams and referees on time, managing inventory, updating the results & crowd control.• Introduced Live Streaming, Live Score Update (App and Website), adventure and recreational Activities from the Sponsorship raised.• Conceptualised the Sports Meet arena, improving utilization of covered area, theme implementation.

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: Working under the Dean of Alumni Affairs and International Relations, Team Students' Alumni Cell strives to establish and nurture the interaction between the Institute and its alumni. It has served as a platform facilitating communication between the current students of IIT Kharagpur and their predecessors. The team works on facets like Networking, Publications and Events with an objective to keep the alumni connected to their Alma Mater and updated about the latest happenings in the Institute.We organize events like the Annual Alumni Meet (Reunion), Regional Student-Alumni Meet, Guest Lectures and carry on programmes like the Student Alumni Mentorship to meet our objective. See less
